sentences.sContent: Life is never dull when Elizabeth is here.
sentences.sCn: 有伊丽莎白在这里生活绝不会无聊。

sentences.sContent: It sounded pretty dull to me.
The weekly meeting tends to be deadly dull (= very dull ) .
sentences.sCn: 每周一次的会议总是十分无聊。

sentences.sContent: The bird is dull brown and gray in colour.
sentences.sCn: 这只鸟是暗淡的棕灰色。

sentences.sContent: ...Omit dull and ineffective generalities and make sure you give concrete examples...
...You know any picture of a person who poses for the camera would look dull and unnatural...

synos.tran: 钝的；迟钝的；无趣的；呆滞的；阴暗的

remMethod.val: 和充实的(full)相反的是乏味的(dull)

words.tran: 迟钝地；沉闷地；没精打采地
